post.excerpt:
## Introduction

This documentation will teach you how to build a chatbot app using the Kata Platform and connect it to Generic Channel. You can use Generic Channel for the channel not yet available in Kata Platform so that you can make a “wrapper

next.title: How to Improve Your Chatbot Intelligence by Training Your NLU
